name: Homzmart LLC
description: Operator of an internet retail platform intended to sell home furnishings. The company's platform sells home furniture, décor, lighting, and supplies through a visualized community with a wide range of variety and quality products, enabling homeowners to connect with home professionals to take advice and get home supplies at a low cost.
